timeline.message: GEODE-8432: use regionPath directly instead of getRegion when put event into parallelGatewaySenderQueue

timeline.bodyText: Reading through ticket comments; it sounded like getRegion() can block when region is under GII or recovery...Is that expected, if not then the issue may be in how getRegion() is working...As I understand, application can operate on region even when the region GII is in progress.
timeline.author: agingade
